attempt.pickup.charter.fail: You are not worthy of such things.
death.absolved.monolith: %1$s was the next step forwards to the Renewal
death.attack.bullet.player: %1$s had their contract sealed thanks to %2$s
item.saxophone.avaritias_mask.desc: A sickly, disgusting mask worn by a mockery of god.
item.saxophone.bulwark.desc_1: A weapon for a formidable arms dealer.
item.saxophone.bulwark.desc_2: Engraved in it are etchings of times long past:
item.saxophone.bulwark.desc_3: Of a Hostess and a Vessel.
item.saxophone.contract_signed_1: May they serve as an example.
item.saxophone.deific_warrant.desc: A formal granting of protection by §kAvarice
item.saxophone.deitys_handbell.desc: A calling card for something higher.
tooltip.saxophone.charter_1: A powerful claim over an area
tooltip.saxophone.monolith_1: A forsaken artifact created as the mercy of a god,
tooltip.saxophone.monolith_2: and a gift for those unwilling to go further.
tooltip.saxophone.obituary.authority_1: An artifact which contains immense mystical power
tooltip.saxophone.obituary.authority_2: used to deliver the judgement of §kAvarice
death.attack.encounter: %1$s was the next step towards the Renewal
saxophone.midnightconfig.title: Saxophone
item.saxophone.salvation.desc: A tool used to save us from what's coming.
